content:
We will be having our FHIR Shorthand monthly teleconference call at 9am EDT (GMT-4) tomorrow, Thursday, March 12. Agenda is as follows:

  • Review Sushi Updates (versions 9.0 - 10.0)
  • Discuss May 2020 Ballot Plans (including recent updates to spec)

Online (recommended): https://meet.mitre.org/mkramer/K383VJGC
Phone: +1 (781) 271-2020 (conference #: 7277283)
I have a clash at that time - will the meeting be recorded so I can listen in afterwards?
Yes, I believe we plan on recording it.
I also have a clash - with sleep :). Obviously not dedicated enough...
Here are the meeting minutes from today: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+Shorthand+Minutes+2020-03-12 including video of the meeting for those who are interested.
Shame I could not make the call. I have read the minutes and watched the recording (thank you) - great progress being made.
